price: Књигу објављује, у то нема сумње, Господар светова.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
